subject: Critical Thinking
title: Post Hoc Ergo Propter Hoc: After Therefore Because?
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Post Hoc Ergo Propter Hoc: After Therefore Because?.

hook.text: 'I wore my lucky socks and we won the game.' Your socks didn't cause the victory. Sequence isn't causation.

buildup.text: Post hoc ergo propter hoc: 'after this, therefore because of this.' Assuming that because B followed A, A caused B.

discovery.text: It's the basis of most superstitions. A rooster crows before dawn ‚Äî but the rooster doesn't cause the sunrise.

twist.text: Medical quackery exploits this ruthlessly. Take a remedy, then improve naturally. You credit the remedy.

climax.text: To prove causation over temporal sequence, you need repeated trials, control groups, and mechanism.

punchline.text: What came first isn't necessarily what caused it.

quiz.question: What does 'post hoc ergo propter hoc' mean?
options: After this, therefore because of this ‚Äî falsely assuming sequence equals causation
